item.title: Linux useradd
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: 如何修linux 下的用户名 How can I rename an unix user? sudo usermod -l jetson -m -d /home/jetson jeston jeston ==> jetson sudo groupmod -n jetson jeston Create a new temp account with sudo rights: sudo adduser temp sudo adduser temp sudo echo 'temp ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL' > /etc/sudoers.d/temp Log out from your current account and back in with the temp account.
